attributes.action: car tax to be payable monthly
attributes.additional_details:
give us the option to pay car tax by monthly direct debit
these days when every thing is electronic the dvla know who is insured and who is not why not make life easy for us every day motorists who unless you are wealthy find the prospect for paying in one lump sum very difficult the government  do this in other areas why not car tax ? it may even cut down on un taxed cars but better still finding £24 a month is easier than finding £240 once a year
